## Accessor.getValue() method

Gets the value of the property on the source object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getValue(source: any): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  source | <code>any</code> | The source object to access. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`any`
